text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Nishigai was born on January 22, 1969. She played for Nikko Securities Dream Ladies and OKI FC Winds. She was selected Best Eleven in 1998 season. On May 2, 1999, when Nishigai was 30 years old, she debuted for the Japan national team against United States. She was a member of Japan for 1999 World Cup. She played 2 games for Japan in 1999. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1999 2 0 Total 2 0 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Nikko Securities Dream Ladies players Category:OKI FC Winds players Category:1999 FIFA Women's World Cup players
title: Naoko Nishigai
